title: Blawpaw
author: Blawpaw
content: Blackjack is one of the most prominent games that can be found in every casino anywhere. It is one of the games where I have been able to make a lot of money.There are those who believe that Blackjack was invented by the Romans, but the majority agree that it was invented in France at the beginning of the 18th century. It was called "Vingt-et-Un" which is French for "Twenty-one"                                         The story goes that Blackjack has its origins in a game that was very popular among the French royal class, the Chemin the Fer. It was later brought by immigrants to the Americas and turned into what we know today.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: IIRC 21 game was firstly known as Pontoon then Blackjack exist as another variety of this game. I really like both game but Blackjack became more popular since its much easier to understand. Blackjack is my favorite gambling because it relax me when playing it. There is no precise documentation about the actual origin of this game since it was just mention on old novel which means it already exist way longer that then.I do some research about this game before but I can’t find any material that will lead me to its  real origin to provide a better history for this game. Add some facts here about the game to make this thread more informative.
